ConfigurationGroup.title: United Parcel Services Reservation
ConfigurationGroup.description: Configuration Settings For The UPS Reservation Shipping Module

INSTALLED.title: Installed Status
INSTALLED.description: Tells if the module is installed or not

STATUS.title: Enable UPS Reservation Shipping
STATUS.description: Do you want to offer UPS reservation shipping?

TAX_CLASS.title: Tax Class
TAX_CLASS.description: Use the following tax class on the shipping fee.

ZONE.title: Shipping Zone
ZONE.description: If a zone is selected, only enable this shipping method for that zone.

DISPLAY_ORDER.title: Display Order
DISPLAY_ORDER.description: Display Order. Lowest is displayed first.

MODULE_ORDER_SHIPPING_UPS_RESERVATION_PI.title: UPS Pickup Method
MODULE_ORDER_SHIPPING_UPS_RESERVATION_PI.description: How do you give packages to UPS? CC - Customer Counter, RDP - Daily Pickup, OTP - One Time Pickup, LC - Letter Center, OCA - On Call Air

MODULE_ORDER_SHIPPING_UPS_RESERVATION_PA.title: UPS Reservation Packaging?
MODULE_ORDER_SHIPPING_UPS_RESERVATION_PA.description: CP - Your Packaging, ULE - UPS Letter, UT - UPS Tube, UBE - UPS Express Box

MODULE_ORDER_SHIPPING_UPS_RESERVATION_RE.title: Residential Delivery?
MODULE_ORDER_SHIPPING_UPS_RESERVATION_RE.description: Quote for Residential (RES) or Commercial Delivery (COM)

MODULE_ORDER_SHIPPING_UPS_RESERVATION_HA.title: Handling Fee
MODULE_ORDER_SHIPPING_UPS_RESERVATION_HA.description: Handling fee for this shipping method.
